verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> came to me. <S%H559><s%>

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies: <S%H6635><s%> "I am jealous <S%H7065><s%> for Zion <S%H6726><s%> with great <S%H1419><s%> jealousy, <S%H7068><s%> and I am jealous <S%H7065><s%> for her with great <S%H1419><s%> wrath. <S%H2534><s%>"

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> "I have returned <S%H7725><s%> to Zion, <S%H6726><s%> and will dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> shall be called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H5892><s%> 'The City of Truth; <S%H571><s%>' and the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> <S%H6944><s%> 'The Holy Mountain. <S%H2022><s%>'"

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies: <S%H6635><s%> "Old men <S%H2205><s%> and old women <S%H2205><s%> will again dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the streets <S%H7339><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> with his staff <S%H4938><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%> for very <S%H7230><s%> age. <S%H3117><s%>
The streets <S%H7339><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> will be full <S%H4390><s%> of boys <S%H3206><s%> and girls <S%H3207><s%> playing <S%H7832><s%> in its streets. <S%H7339><s%>"

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies: <S%H6635><s%> "If it is marvelous <S%H6381><s%> in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of this people <S%H5971><s%> in those days, <S%H3117><s%> should it also be marvelous <S%H6381><s%> in my eyes? <S%H5869><s%>" says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%>

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies: <S%H6635><s%> "Behold, <S%H3467><s%> I will save my people <S%H5971><s%> from the east <S%H4217><s%> country, <S%H776><s%> and from the west <S%H3996><s%> country; <S%H776><s%>

and I will bring <S%H935><s%> them, <S%H7931><s%> and they will dwell in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> and they will be my people, <S%H5971><s%> and I will be their God, <S%H430><s%> in truth <S%H571><s%> and in righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>"

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies: <S%H6635><s%> "Let your hands <S%H3027><s%> be strong, <S%H2388><s%> you who hear <S%H8085><s%> in these days <S%H3117><s%> these words <S%H1697><s%> from the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the prophets <S%H5030><s%> who were in the day <S%H3117><s%> that the foundation <S%H3245><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> was laid, <S%H3245><s%> even the temple, <S%H1964><s%> that it might be built. <S%H1129><s%>

For before <S%H6440><s%> those days <S%H3117><s%> there was <S%H1961><s%> no wages <S%H7939><s%> for man, <S%H120><s%> nor any wages <S%H7939><s%> for an animal; <S%H929><s%> neither was there any peace <S%H7965><s%> to him who went out <S%H3318><s%> or came in, <S%H935><s%> because of the adversary. <S%H6862><s%> For I set <S%H7971><s%> all men <S%H120><s%> everyone <S%H376><s%> against his neighbor. <S%H7453><s%>
But now I will not be to the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of this people <S%H5971><s%> as in the former <S%H7223><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%>" says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%>

"For the seed <S%H2233><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> and the vine <S%H1612><s%> will yield <S%H5414><s%> its fruit, <S%H6529><s%> and the ground <S%H776><s%> will give <S%H5414><s%> its increase, <S%H2981><s%> and the heavens <S%H8064><s%> will give <S%H5414><s%> their dew; <S%H2919><s%> and I will cause the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of this people <S%H5971><s%> to inherit all these things. <S%H5157><s%>

It shall come to pass that, <S%H7045><s%> as you were a curse among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> so will I save <S%H3467><s%> you, <S%H1293><s%> and you shall be a blessing. Don't <S%H3372><s%> be afraid. Let your hands <S%H3027><s%> be strong. <S%H2388><s%>"

For thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies: <S%H6635><s%> "As I thought <S%H2161><s%> to do evil <S%H7489><s%> to you, <S%H1><s%> when your fathers provoked me to wrath, <S%H7107><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> "and I didn't <S%H5162><s%> repent;

so again <S%H7725><s%> have I thought <S%H2161><s%> in these days <S%H3117><s%> to do good <S%H3190><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%> Don't <S%H3372><s%> be afraid.

These are the things <S%H1697><s%> that you shall do: <S%H6213><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> the truth <S%H571><s%> with his neighbor. <S%H7453><s%> Execute <S%H8199><s%> the judgment <S%H4941><s%> of truth <S%H571><s%> and peace <S%H7965><s%> in your gates, <S%H8179><s%>

and let none <S%H376><s%> of you devise <S%H2803><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in your hearts <S%H3824><s%> against his neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> and love <S%H157><s%> no false <S%H8267><s%> oath: <S%H7621><s%> for all these are things that I hate, <S%H8130><s%>" says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
The word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> came to me. <S%H559><s%>

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies: <S%H6635><s%> "The fasts <S%H6685><s%> of the fourth <S%H7243><s%> fifth, <S%H2549><s%> seventh, <S%H7637><s%> and tenth <S%H6224><s%> months shall be for the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> joy <S%H8342><s%> and gladness, <S%H8057><s%> and cheerful <S%H2896><s%> feasts. <S%H4150><s%> Therefore love <S%H157><s%> truth <S%H571><s%> and peace. <S%H7965><s%>"

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies: <S%H6635><s%> "Many peoples, <S%H5971><s%> and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> will yet come; <S%H935><s%>

and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> shall go <S%H1980><s%> to another, <S%H259><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H3212><s%> 'Let us go speedily <S%H1980><s%> to entreat <S%H2470><s%> the favor <S%H6440><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and to seek <S%H1245><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%> I will go also. <S%H3212><s%>'

Yes, <S%H7227><s%> many peoples <S%H5971><s%> and strong <S%H6099><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> will come <S%H935><s%> to seek <S%H1245><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> in Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and to entreat <S%H2470><s%> the favor <S%H6440><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>"

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies: <S%H6635><s%> "In those days, <S%H3117><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> men <S%H582><s%> will take hold, <S%H2388><s%> out of all the languages <S%H3956><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> they will take hold <S%H2388><s%> of the skirt <S%H3671><s%> of him who is a Jew, <S%H376><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H3212><s%> 'We will go with you, <S%H8085><s%> for we have heard that God is with you. <S%H430><s%>'"
